net.kuujo.vertigo.feeder

Interface StreamFeeder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component<StreamFeeder>, Feeder<StreamFeeder>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultStreamFeeder

    public interface StreamFeeder
extends Feeder<StreamFeeder>
    A stream feeder. The stream feeder is designed to integrate with Vert.x ReadStream APIs by mimicking the WriteStream interface.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      StreamFeeder drainHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<Void> handler)

      • Methods inherited from interface net.kuujo.vertigo.feeder.Feeder

        emit, emit, getMaxQueueSize, getRetryAttempts, isAutoRetry, queueFull, setAutoRetry, setMaxQueueSize, setRetryAttempts

    • Method Detail

      • drainHandler

        StreamFeeder drainHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<Void> handler)
        Sets a drain handler on the feeder. The drain handler will be called when the feed queue is available to receive new messages.
        Parameters:
        handler - A handler to be invoked when a full feed queue is emptied.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.

      • emit

        String emit(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject data,
          org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> ackHandler)
        Emits data to from the feeder with an ack handler.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to emit.
        ackHandler - An asynchronous result handler to be invoke with the ack result.
        Returns:
        The emitted message identifier.

      • emit

        String emit(org.vertx.java.core.json.JsonObject data,
          String tag,
          org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Void>> ackHandler)
        Emits data from the feeder with an ack handler.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to emit.
        tag - A tag to apply to the data.
        ackHandler - An asynchronous result handler to be invoke with the ack result.
        Returns:
        The emitted message identifier.
